profile.title: Profaịlụ Onye Ọrụ
profile.mustLogin: Ị ga-abanye ka ị hụ ntọala.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Gosi ederede mbụ na nke e sụgharịrị
profile.noPrivateKey: Enweghị igodo nzuzo na ngwaọrụ a iji zipụ.
profile.setBackupPassword: Tọọ okwuntughe iji zoro ezo ndabere gị:
profile.importSuccess: E tinyelarị igodo nzuzo na ngwaọrụ a.
profile.importFailed: Enweghị ike ibubata igodo (okwuntughe ezighi ezi ma ọ bụ faịlụ emerụla).
profile.keysRotated: E mepụtala mkpụrụigodo ọhụrụ ma bulite igodo ọha.
profile.importKey: Bubata ndabere igodo e gbara ezo
profile.keyDisclaimer: Igodo nzuzo gị anaghị apụ na ngwaọrụ a. Zipụ oyiri e gbara ezo ka i weghachite ya na ngwaọrụ ọzọ.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Ị nọ na Free—jiri nhọrọ Anyanwụ/Ọnwa dị n'okpuru. Melite ka ị meghee isiokwu ndị ọzọ.
profile.backupTitle: Ndabere e gbara ezo & Mmekọrịta Ngwaọrụ
profile.backupDesc: Mepụta ndabere e gbara ezo nke igodo gị, ma weghachite na ngwaọrụ ọzọ ka ha sụnye ọnụ.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Mee ka ozi bụrụ blur ndabara
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Mee blur mgbe ngwa adịghị n’ihu
profile.notifyOnCopy: Kụọ m aka ọkwa ma ọ bụrụ na e detụrụ ozi m
profile.followHint: Akụkọ ha ga-apụta na nri Na-eso gị ma ha bipụta na ndị Na-eso (ma ọ bụ Ọha).
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Ihe ụfọdụ mebiri na ngalaba a.
profile.callTextForwardingTitle: Ntughari oku na/ma ọ bụ ozi ederede
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Tugharia oku na ozi nbata gaa na ekwentị ma ọ bụ email i nyekwara aka. Oku/ozi na-apụ nwere ike igosi nọmba Chatforia gị.

chat.selectPrompt: Họrọ ederede ma ọ bụ ụlọ mkparịta ụka ka ị malite ikwurịta okwu
chat.emptySubtitle: Ziga ozi ka i malite mkparịta ụka.

sidebar.loginPrompt: Banye ka i gbanwee ntọala gị.

premium.heading: Gaa Premium
premium.description: Meghee atụmatụ ike & wepu mgbasa ozi.

auth.headline: Ozi echekwara, zuru ụwa ọnụ, na ntụgharị ozugbo
auth.description: Nchekwa n’isi ruo n’isi (E2E), ntụgharị asụsụ AI, ozi na-efu n’oge, na oku olu/vidio.

feature.privacy: Nzuzo n’ihu. Data gị, njikwa gị.

auth.desktopTip: Na desktọpụ? Tụgharịa ekwentị gị ka ị nyochaa koodu QR.
auth.subhead: Ozi nzuzo, echekwara, a na-atugharị ozugbo.
auth.tip: Ị nwere ike iji Chatforia na ngwaọrụ ọ bụla — ma budata ngwa maka ahụmịhe kacha mma.
auth.scanHint: Nyochaa ka ibudata ngwa ma ọ bụ mepee na brawza gị.

home.title: Ụlọ
home.subheader: Ziga ozi ka i malite mkparịta ụka.
home.upload: Bulite foto ma ọ bụ vidio

press.title: Akụkọ mgbasa ozi
press.contact: Maka ajụjụ mgbasa ozi, kpọtụrụ anyị na press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Maka ajụjụ mgbasa ozi, kpọtụrụ press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia bụ onye ozi echekwara nwere ntụgharị ozugbo na E2E, e mere ya iji mee ka mkparịta ụka zuru ụwa ọnụ bụrụ nke nzuzo na enweghị mgbagha.
press.assetsText: Logos, screenshots, na onyonyo ngwaahịa (na-abịa n’oge na-adịghị anya).

careers.title: Ọrụ
careers.intro: Anyị bụ obere otu na-ewu onye ozi zuru ụwa ọnụ. Ọ bụrụ na ị na-elebara nche, nnweta, na UX anụrị anya, anyị ga-anụ ụtọ ịnụ gị.
careers.openRoles: Ọrụ meghere: Injiniya (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Ngwaahịa, Nkwado.
careers.apply: Otu esi etinye: Ziga resume/liṅks gị na jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Gbasara Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia bụ onye ozi ọtụtụ asụsụ nwere nche n’isi ruo n’isi, ntụgharị ozugbo, na oku olu/vidio. Ebumnuche anyị dị mfe: inyere ndị mmadụ aka ijikọ — n’enweghị ụjọ, n’ezoghị ọnụ, na n’asụsụ ọ bụla.

values.access: Nnweta maka onye ọ bụla: Ntughari asụsụ 100+ na-akpaghị aka.
values.control: Njikọ: Ozi na-efu n’oge & nkwenye ịgụ bụ nhọrọ.

about.howDescription: A na-ezo ozi na ngwaọrụ gị tupu ọ pụọ. Ntughari, ndabere, na mmekọrịta ngwaọrụ e mere ka ihe sava anyị nwere ike ịhụ bụrụ pere mpe.

advertise.title: Kwapụta na Chatforia
advertise.description: Rutere ndị ọrụ ozi na-agba mbọ site na ebe a na-ahụ anya nke ọma, nkwado, na promos ụlọ. Ndị debanyere Premium anaghị ahụ mgbasa ozi.

adsense.withPubId: Anyị na-eje ozi site na Google AdSense. Ọ bụrụ na ịchọrọ ịgụnye anyị site na Google Ads, jiri publisher ID {{pubId}} ma jụọ maka managed placement na units dị n'okpuru. Enwere nkwado kpọmkwem—jiri fọomụ ahụ.
adsense.noPubId: Anyị na-eje ozi site na Google AdSense. Enwerekwa nkwado kpọmkwem—jiri fọm dị n'okpuru.

advertise.noPlacements: Enweghị ebe a haziri ugbu a. Tinye ha na ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Ọnụ ọgụgụ oge nnọkọ dị elu na ịnọ ogologo oge n'ime UI mkparịta ụka
why.brandSafe: Ụdị dị mma maka ika; capping ugboro e ji gosipụta na-asọpụrụ
why.deals: Nkwenye kpọmkwem ma ọ bụ site na AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Daalụ! Ajụjụ gị na-abịa. Anyị ga-eso ụzọ n’oge adịghị anya.
form.missingRequired: Biko jupụta na aha, email, na ozi.
form.successToast: Daalụ! Anyị ga-akpọtụrụ gị n’oge na-adịghị anya.
form.mailtoInfo: Na-emeghe onye ahịa email gị ka e zigara ajụjụ…
form.messageLabel: Gwa anyị gbasara mgbasa ozi gị
form.messagePlaceholder: Ebumnuche, ụbọchị, KPI, mmasị ebe etinyere…

upgrade.title: Melite
upgrade.subtitle: Họrọ atụmatụ ziri ezi: wepụ mgbasa ozi na Plus, ma ọ bụ nweta atụmatụ ike niile na Premium.

gettingStarted.title: Ibi Malite
gettingStarted.subtitle: Ị bụ onye ọhụrụ na Chatforia? Ndu a na-eme ka ị mara ihe dị mkpa ka i bụrụ onye na-arụ ọrụ n’ime nkeji.

alert.text: Ndu a ga-eto ka anyị na-ebupụta atụmatụ ọhụrụ. Ọ bụrụ na ihe ọ bụla na-efu, gwa anyị site na

section2.title: 2) Malite izipu ozi
section2.item1: Mepụta DM ma ọ bụ Otu ma ziga ozi mbụ.
section2.item2: Jiri ntụgharị ozugbo ka i kparịta n’asụsụ 100+.
section2.item3: Nwale ozi na-efu n’oge na nkwenye ịgụ na Profaịlụ → Nzuzo.

section3.title: 3) Gaa n’ihu
section3.item1Part2: ibe (Plus = enweghị mgbasa ozi, Premium = atụmatụ zuru ezu).
section3.item2Part1: Jikọọ ngwaọrụ ndị ọzọ ma tọọ ndabere e gbara ezo na

account.q: Olee otu m ga-esi mepụta ma ọ bụ weghachite akaụntụ m?
account.a: Budata ngwa ma ọ bụ jiri weebụ, pịa “Mepụta akaụntụ”, gosi email/ekwentị gị. Iji weghachite, jiri “Chefuru okwuntughe”.

privacy.a: Ee. Ozi na oku na-edozi n’isi ruo n’isi ndabara. Naanị gị na onye nnata nwere ikegụ ha.

translate.q: Olee otu ntụgharị ozugbo si arụ ọrụ?
translate.a: Gbanye “Tọghata akpaghị aka” na Ntọala → Ọdịdị & Asụsụ. Anyị na-atugharị na ngwaọrụ ebe ọ kwere, ma ọ bụghị ya site na API echekwara na obere metadata.

contact.a: Kpọtụrụ anyị na support@chatforia.com. Tinye screenshots na ụdị ngwa gị.

contact.title: Kpọtụrụ Anyị
contact.successMsg: Daalụ—otu anyị ga-aza site na email.
contact.errorSend: Enweghị ike iziga. Biko ziga email na support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: Iwu Nzuzo a na-akọwa otu Chatforia (“anyị”) si anakọta, jiri, na kesaa ozi mgbe ị na-eji ngwa na ọrụ anyị. Anyi na-eme Chatforia ka ozi anyị nwere ike ịhụ bụrụ nke kacha nta.

infoWeCollect.title: Ozi anyị na-anakọta
infoWeCollect.account: Ozi akaụntụ (dịka email/ekwentị) iji mepụta ma chekwaa akaụntụ.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ozi e gbara ezo (ozi/oku) bụ E2E; anyị enweghị ikegụ ya.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Nyocha/iji dị ka crash logs, ụdị ngwaọrụ, ma ọ bụ nyocha dị mfe iji meziwanye arụmọrụ.

howWeUse.title: Otu anyị si eji ozi
howWeUse.provide: Nye ma chekwaa ọrụ (nbanye, ịchọpụta spam/imebi iwu).

sharing.title: Nkesa
sharing.body: Anyị anaghị ere data onwe onye. Anyị nwere ike ịkekọrịta obere data na ndị na-enyere aka (dịka push, nyocha) n'okpuru nkwekọrịta siri ike.

rights.title: Ike gị
rights.body: Dabere na mpaghara gị (dịka GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), ịnwere ike ịrịọ ohere, ndozi, ihichapụ, ma ọ bụ ịpụ na ụfọdụ nhazi. Kpọtụrụ: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Idobe data & nche
retention.body: Anyị na-edobe naanị ihe achọrọ iji rụọ ọrụ ma tinye nche ụlọ ọrụ. E2E enweghị ike ịkụda site n'aka anyị.

children.title: Ụmụaka
children.body: Chatforia adịghị maka ụmụaka n’okpuru afọ 13 (ma ọ bụ dịka iwu mpaghara gị si dị).

changes.title: Mgbanwe
changes.body: Anyị ga-ebipụta mmelite ebe a ma gbanwee ụbọchị “Emezuru ikpeazụ”.

intro.body: Site n’iji Chatforia, ị kwenyere na Usoro a. Ọ bụrụ na ị kwụghị, ejila ọrụ a.

accounts.title: Akaụntụ
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Nye ozi ziri ezi ma chekwaa aha nbanye.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Ị na-ebu ọrụ maka ihe omume n’akaụntụ gị.

acceptableUse.title: Ojiji kwekọrọ n’iwu
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Enweghị ọdịnaya iwu na-akwadoghi, mmegbu, ma ọ bụ mmebi ikike; enweghị spam ma ọ bụ mmegbu akpaka.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Anyị nwere ike kwụsị/kwatuo maka mmebi.

yourContent.title: Odinala gị
yourContent.body: Ị na-edobe ikike n’odinala gị. Ị na-enye anyị ikike achọrọ iji rụọ ọrụ (dịka ịzipu, idobe, ntụgharị).

disclaimer.title: Nkwupụta & ibu ọrụ
disclaimer.body: A na-enye ọrụ “dị ka ọ dị” na-enweghị nkwa. N’ogo kacha ekwe omume n’iwu, Chatforia anaghị eburu ibu ọrụ maka mmerụ nke etiti ma ọ bụ ihe na-esite na ya.

changes.title: Mgbanwe
changes.body: Anyị nwere ike melite usoro a; iji ya na-aga n’ihu mgbe e gbanwere pụtara nnabata.

doNotSell.title: Ejiela ma ọ bụ kesaa Ozi Onwe M
doNotSell.body: Chatforia anaghị ere ozi onwe onye. Ndị bi na California ka nwere ike iziga arịrịọ n’okpuru CPRA site na bọtịnụ dị n'okpuru.

cookies.title: Ntọala Kukị
cookies.body: Chatforia na-eji kukị pere mpe (dịka nnọchi, nche). Anyi anaghị eji kukị mgbasa ozi nke ndị ọzọ. Jikwaa kukị site na ntọala brawza gị.
